segments.text: But what if I don't win what I bid on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then it wasn't meant to be . Some people have put up a hard fight for some items I bid on . But I was the sole bidder for this bag and got it dirt-cheap .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It seems that you can e-mail the seller and ask questions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I've even e-mailed some people who had bought from the person who sold this bag .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They said he was an honest and professional businessman . But that's the exciting part . It's kind of like gambling ...
segments.speaker: S2
